channel.title: Help with metasequoia?
channel.description: Well I have made an axe in metasequoia.. and I'm almost done with it but... I need to mirror it. This is where the problem is, I can't select all on my model, is there a reason for this? [url=http://tinypic.com/r/mmswua/3]View My Video[/url] Could you please look at this video? the quality sucks but you should be able to tell what Im pointing act if you've even used metasequoia before :) anyways, if you can help me.. I'll love you long time, and try to make a model for you

item.title: Help with metasequoia?
item.dc:creator: @S_I_N_N_E_R S I N N E R
item.description:
@S_I_N_N_E_R wrote:

I love you guys with no end, this helped so much. I wish I could rep+.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with metasequoia?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

If your using vista you need the vista version of metasequoia.

Other than that, selection problems are caused

  1. by having a locked object
  2. accidently pressing spacebar
    3)not being able to select anything - in the ‘edit option’ tab on left there are 3 buttons pt,ln and fc, these allow you to choose what is selected, generally they should all be ON

Read full topic

item.description:

nope, wont move… here’s the funny thing though, I started a cape with the blank template, and it seems I can’t move anything, or select anything… maybe I need a newer version of metasequoia? or just to reinstall?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with metasequoia?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Mmm, are all your objects merged into one object?
Check in the objpanel and see how many objects there are.

item.title: Help with metasequoia?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

If my internet didn’t go at 0.6kb/s then i could’ve helped you by now.
For now:

[ul][li]Check the objects aren’t locked.[/li]
[li]Merge all objects into one.[/li][/ul]

If that doesn’t work then i’ll just wait until the video’s loaded.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 20-07-2009, 19:36:41[/size][hr]Ok, just looked at the first 10 seconds of the video, where are your matpanel and objpanel?
They should be displayed all the time, under system tab on the left hand side, just press ‘MatPanel’ and ‘ObjPanel’.

Read full topic
